categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Father" was an elderly, obese Rodian who worked as a curator for the Obohn Gallery of the Industrial Aesthetic. He made use of a hoverchair to move around and worked alongside the Muun Dremullar Obohn di Garthos. He spoke a language that to Marn Hierogryph sounded like "whispered squawks," which were readily translated by Obohn.
